name: Jalapeno Popper Chickpea Salad Sandwich
description: This Jalapeno Popper Chickpea Salad Sandwich recipe combines two favorites into a new exciting lunch sandwich! Protein-rich chickpeas and veggies tossed with a creamy tofu based jalapeño popper dip, with a bit of a kick thanks to both pickled and fresh jalapenos!  Soyfree option Glutenfree option

video.name: JALAPEÑO POPPER CHICKPEA SALAD SANDWICH | Vegan Recipes by Richa Hingle
video.description:
Jalapeño Popper Chickpea Salad Sandwich

FULL RECIPE— https://www.veganricha.com/jalapeno-popper-chickpea-salad-sandwich/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

This Jalapeno Popper Chickpea Salad Sandwich recipe combines two favorites into a new exciting lunch sandwich! Protein-rich chickpeas and veggies tossed with a creamy jalapeño tofu dip, with a bit of a kick thanks to both pickled and fresh jalapenos!
Soyfree option on the post.

******MORE SANDWICH RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

PULLED JACKFRUIT SANDWICHES – VEGAN PULLED “PORK”: https://www.veganricha.com/pulled-jackfruit-sandwiches/

SPICY AVOCADO CHICKPEA SALAD SANDWICH: https://www.veganricha.com/spicy-avocado-chickpea-salad-sandwich/

VEGAN GENERAL TSO’S TOFU SANDWICH: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-general-tsos-tofu-sandwich/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

#chickpeasaladsandwich #chickpeasalad #jalapenopoppers #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup Silken or firm tofu  (or 1/4 cup raw cashews soaked in hot water for 15 mins for soyfree )
1 tbsp nutritional yeast  (or ½ tsp prepared mustard)
15 oz can of chickpeas (or 1.5 cups cooked )
¼ cup chopped red bell pepper
2 tbsp chopped fresh jalapeno ((remove seeds to reduce heat if needed))
4  bread slices ((use Glutenfree bread for gf or serve in a bowl with crunchy greens and veggies ) )
Greens like spinach (cucumber, or other fresh veggies)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all the dip ingredients until smooth in a blender. Add a tbsp water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all the dip ingredients until smooth in a blender. Add a tbsp water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the cooked chickpeas in a bowl until mostly mashed with a few whole ones left.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the cooked chickpeas in a bowl until mostly mashed with a few whole ones left.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the rest of the chickpea salad ingredients including the tofu dip and mix really well. Chill for 15 mins
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the rest of the chickpea salad ingredients including the tofu dip and mix really well. Chill for 15 mins

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and flavor as needed. Add something sweet like dried cranberries or raisins If you like or toasted cashews.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and flavor as needed. Add something sweet like dried cranberries or raisins If you like or toasted cashews.

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble, prepare sandwich bread or wrap. Add a good helping of chickpea sandwich mix. Top with pickled jalapeños.
recipeInstructions.name: To assemble, prepare sandwich bread or wrap. Add a good helping of chickpea sandwich mix. Top with pickled jalapeños.

keywords: chickpea salad recipe vegan, chickpea salad sandwich, creamy vegan chickpea salad
